data.title: Confident Thais eye win in Asean football opener
data.description: Thailand may be missing many of their key players but they remain confident of kicking off the defence of their Asean championship title with a victory over Timor Leste at Hang Day Stadium in Vietnam Sunday night.

data.title: Confident Thais eye win in opener
data.description: Thailand may be missing many of their key players but they remain confident of kicking off the defence of their Asean championship title with a victory over Timor Leste at Hang Day Stadium in Vietnam Sunday night.

data.title: ONE Championship: Christian Lee eyes return in March after eye poke ends big return early
data.description: Christian Lee’s long-awaited ONE Championship comeback ended in anticlimactic fashion after an unintentional eye poke left title challenger Alibeg Rasulov unable to continue in Saturday’s ONE Fight Night 26 main event in Bangkok.

data.title: Kirins, Port make ACL 2 2nd round
data.description: Muang Thong United secured their place in the knockout stage after a dramatic 1-0 victory over Jeonbuk Hyundai Motors in the AFC Champions League Two at Rajamangala Stadium on Thursday night.

data.title: Midweek goal fest: 35 strikes, thrilling ties
data.description: For many years there has been something special about matches between Newcastle and Liverpool that guarantees entertainment. Fans were not disappointed in the midweek clash at St James

data.title: Thais leave for Vietnam to begin Asean title defence
data.description: Champions Thailand left for Vietnam on Friday morning to kick off their title defence of the Asean Mitsubishi Electric Cup 2024.

data.title: ONE Championship: Petchtanong denies ‘running away’ after hospital visit, with Nabil fight cancelled
data.description: Petchtanong Petchfergus’ kickboxing bout with Nabil Anane has been removed from Saturday’s ONE Fight Night 26 card at Lumpinee Stadium in Bangkok.

data.title: HM Queen to compete in sailing
data.description: Her Majesty the Queen will join Thailand

data.title: ONE Championship: three fighters miss weight for Fight Night 26 card in Bangkok
data.description: Three fighters missed weight for ONE Fight night 26 at Thursday’s official ONE Championship weigh-ins and hydration tests in Bangkok.

data.title: Angels seal top spot with thrilling Nam Dinh victory
data.description: Bangkok United finished as Group G winners after they defeated Nam Dinh FC 3-2 in the AFC Champions League Two at Thammasat Stadium on Wednesday night.

data.title: Buriram and Johor stay in hunt after fiery battle
data.description: Buriram United could only pick up a point following a goalless draw with Malaysia

data.title: Angels gunning for home win in ACL 2
data.description: Bangkok United will be going all-out for the top spot when they face Nam Dinh at home in an AFC Champions League Two Group G encounter on Wednesday.

data.title: Staying in the swing beyond 60
data.description: As l edge slowly and carefully out of bed whilst discovering new twinges of pain, the reality of having to smack a little ball around a course later in the day becomes a worrying harsh reality.

data.title: Peter Perfect! Uihlein tops with victory
data.description: Doha: Peter Uihlein proved simply too strong at the US$2.5 million International Series Qatar on Sunday, marching to a five-shot victory at Doha Golf Club.

data.title: Peeradol to lead Asean c'ship squad
data.description: The Football Association of Thailand (FAT) has appointed Peeradol Chamratsamee as the new skipper of the War Elephants for the upcoming AFF Mitsubishi Electric Cup 2024.

data.title: ONE Championship star Soe Lin Oo survives serious car crash, but is ruled out of Seksan fight
data.description: Myanmar’s Soe Lin Oo survived a serious car crash on Saturday night, but has been ruled out of his return to ONE Championship action next month in Bangkok.

data.title: Another title for Dechapol, Supissara
data.description: Mixed doubles players Dechapol Puavaranukroh and Supissara Paewsampran claimed their second title after winning he US$210,000 BWF Syed Modi India International 2024 in Lucknow on Sunday.

data.title: Lamphun post convincing triumph at Nakhon Pathom
data.description: Lamphun Warriors fired on all cylinders on Saturday night when they routed hosts Nakhon Pathom United 3-0 in a Thai League 1 encounter.

data.title: Prachuap held at home by Swat Cats in action-packed T1 thriller
data.description: Hosts PT Prachuap shared a point with Nakhon Ratchasima, who were reduced to 10 men late in the match, following an exciting 2-2 draw on Friday night.

data.title: Doubles duo earn shot at another title
data.description: Mixed doubles players Dechapol Puavaranukroh and Supissara Paewsampran will be having a second shot a World Tour title in a space of two weeks after reaching the final of the US$210,000 BWF Syed Modi India International 2024 in Lucknow on Saturday.

data.title: Leicester City name Van Nistelrooy as new coach
data.description: LONDON -  Leicester City  have appointed former Manchester United star  Ruud van Nistelrooy  as their new manager on a contract until June 2027, the Premier League football club has announced.

data.title: ONE Championship hopeful Yunusov thanks Anatoly Malykhin after KO and bonus in Bangkok
data.description: Rustam Yunusov has thanked Anatoly Malykhin and the two-division ONE Championship MMA champ’s wife after another big victory in Bangkok.

data.title: ONE Championship ‘honoured’ by Eliud Kipchoge’s presence for Friday Fights 89 at Lumpinee Stadium
data.description: Marathon legend Eliud Kipchoge was the star guest for another action-packed night full of knockouts and bonuses at ONE Friday Fights 89 in Bangkok.

data.title: ONE Championship’s new grappling star Dante Leon feels ‘no pressure to fill Mikey Musumeci void’
data.description: ONE Championship’s latest grappling star signing Dante Leon insists he feels “no pressure to fill a void left by Mikey Musumeci”.

data.title: ONE Championship: Nabil says kickboxing is ‘easier than Muay Thai’, plans ‘something special’ for Petchtanong
data.description: Nabil Anane admits he is the underdog against “master” Petchtanong Petchfergus at ONE Fight Night 26 next week in Bangkok – but feels kickboxing is “easier than Muay Thai”, and warns the former champ he has “something special” planned.

data.title: There's plenty for Thai star Jeeno to smile about
data.description: It has been both a triumphant and lucrative week for Thailand

data.title: Thai shuttlers stay on course in Lucknow
data.description: Mixed doubles pair Dechapol Puavaranukroh and Supissara Paewsampran and women

data.title: Port progress, Kirins revive ACL 2 hopes
data.description: Thai League 1 giants Port sealed progression to the knockout stage of the AFC Champions League Two after a 2-2 draw with Persib Bandung in Group F on Thursday night at BG Stadium.

data.title: Ayaka Miura wants ONE Championship title shot – against Stamp Fairtex or Xiong Jingnan
data.description: Japanese MMA star Ayaka Miura wants a ONE Championship title shot after her latest victory – whether it’s Xiong Jingnan or Stamp Fairtex.

data.title: Dechapol and Supissara storm into Syed Modi quarters
data.description: Mixed doubles players Dechapol Puavaranukroh and Supissara Paewsampran advanced to the quarter-finals of the US$210,000 BWF Syed Modi India International 2024 in Lucknow yesterday.
